name: Windows DCSync-Like Directory Replication Access
title: Windows DCSync-Like Directory Replication Access
description: Detects directory replication access often associated with DCSync (e.g., Replicating Directory Changes).
sigma_text:
title: Windows DCSync-Like Directory Replication Access
id: RULE-013
description: Detects directory replication access often associated with DCSync (e.g., Replicating Directory Changes).
author: detpack-lab
status: stable
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: security
detection:
  selection:
    EventID: 4662
    Properties|contains: Replicating Directory Changes
  filter_machine_account:
    SubjectUserName|endswith: "$"
  condition: selection and not filter_machine_account
falsepositives:
  - Domain controller operations and legitimate replication tooling
level: critical
tags:
  - attack.t1003
  - attack.credential_access
elastic_text: EventID:4662 and Properties:*Replicating Directory Changes* and not SubjectUserName:*$
elastic_kql: EventID:4662 and Properties:*Replicating Directory Changes* and not SubjectUserName:*$
elastic_esql: FROM logs | WHERE EventID:4662 and Properties:*Replicating Directory Changes* and not SubjectUserName:*$
false_positive_notes: Domain controller operations and legitimate replication tooling

tuning_knobs.name: allowlist.principal
tuning_knobs.description: Exclude known admin/automation principals that legitimately trigger this behavior.

tuning_knobs.name: allowlist.hosts
tuning_knobs.description: Exclude known management hosts or jump boxes that legitimately perform the action.
